content: The majority of people making less then $200.000 a year in Detroit have nothing to fear from President Obama. I just heard that Obama is going to task tim Geithner to start looking into the world of sports next. Obama wants to put a cap on how much a football, baseball, or basketball player can make in a year. He feels, as I do, that if a player loves the game as much as they say they do then Making $500,000 a year is more than enough. He wants to see more black people going to these games. Right now they can't afford the price of a ticket. You go Obama. Your the Man.
